<section begin=WeeklyBossDesc />'''Weekly Bosses''' are bosses whose rewards can be claimed once per week. After defeating each boss, a [[Trounce Blossom]] will spawn where players can choose to spend {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=30}} to claim the rewards from the first three weekly bosses of their choice, and then {{Item|Original Resin|30|x=60}} subsequently. Availability of rewards and reduced resin costs reset at 4 AM server time every Monday.

As with [[Normal Boss]]es, Weekly Bosses are immune to [[displacement]], possess significant [[interruption resistance]] and are immune to [[Frozen]] reactions.

Weekly Bosses are generally fought in a [[Trounce Domain]] (thus players can teleport to them) apart from [[Andrius (Weekly Boss)|Andrius]], who is fought in the open world. These bosses are unlocked by completing [[Archon Quest]]s or a specific character's [[Story Quest]]. Once the player reaches [[Adventure Rank]] 40, they can Quick Challenge locked Trounce Domains through the [[Adventurer Handbook]] in Single Player Mode if they have not met the requirements to normally access it.

All weekly bosses drop their own specific [[Character Level-Up Material]]s, which are used to upgrade [[Talent]]s above Level 6. In addition to this, weekly bosses drop {{Item|Adventure EXP|30|x=300}}, a certain amount of {{Item|Mora|30}}, {{Item|Companionship EXP|30}}, [[Character Ascension Material]]s, and [[Artifact]]s depending on the player's [[World Level]].

In addition, there is a 12% chance to drop a [[Northlander Billet]] (for Weekly Bosses in [[Mondstadt]], [[Liyue]], and [[Inazuma]]), a [[Midlander Billet]] ([[Sumeru]] and [[Fontaine]]), or a [[Borderland Billet]] ([[Natlan]]) and a fixed 33% chance to drop a {{Item|Dream Solvent|30|text=Dream Solvent}}.<section end="WeeklyBossDesc" />

==Gameplay Notes==
* Visiting another player's world in [[Co-Op Mode]] and viewing the Weekly Boss from the [[Map]] will display information on whether the host has claimed the Weekly Boss's rewards, except for Andrius, which will always display your own information, regardless if you are in another player's world or not.
